hypothesis_content.title: Miner Outflow Spike as Bear Regime Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC miner outflow (7-day MA) increases >50% from its 30-day average during NEUTRAL regime, and price breaks below 50-day SMA, this confirms transition to BEAR regime within 5 days with >75% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Miners are forced sellers during stress. Outflow spikes indicate capitulation. Breaking 50-day SMA confirms trend change. Hash ribbon near 1 shows no hash rate growth to support price. CryptoQuant's $70K target suggests downside vulnerability.
entry_conditions: Hash ribbon (30-day MA/60-day MA of hash rate) < 1.02

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime transitions to BEAR OR 5 days after entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price reclaims 50-day SMA and holds for 2 days

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If miner outflow spike occurs but price recovers and regime remains NEUTRAL/BULL >40% of occurrences.
